name: CUST_SERVICE
description: The CUST_SERVICE table stores information entered into system's Customer Service module. This can be used to report on communication between medical facility staff and patients.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the customer service communication.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the customer service communication.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the customer service communication was entered.

columns.name: SOURCE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value representing the source type of the customer service communication. Refers to the person or entity contacting your facility's customer service representative.

columns.name: SOURCE_MEMBER_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a person who receives care at your facility or is a member of your health plan, this column contains the Patient (EPT) ID of that member.

columns.name: TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the topic of the customer service communication record.

columns.name: SUBJECT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value representing the subject type of the customer service communication. Refers to the person or entity the customer service communication is about.

columns.name: RES_C_NAME
columns.description: The resolution reason category value for the customer service communication.

columns.name: RES_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who resolved the customer service communication.

columns.name: RES_DATE
columns.description: The date the customer service communication was resolved.

columns.name: RES_SATISFACTION
columns.description: The recorded satisfaction of the customer service communication.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the priority of the customer service communication.

columns.name: SUMMARY
columns.description: The summary of the customer service communication.

columns.name: SOURCE_STAFF_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is an employee of your facility, this column contains the Provider (SER) ID of that employee.

columns.name: SOURCE_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a plan group, this column contains the Payor Plan Group (PPG) ID of that plan group.

columns.name: SOURCE_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: SOURCE_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a carrier, this column contains the Carrier (MCR) ID of that carrier.

columns.name: SOURCE_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: SOURCE_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a guarantor account, this column contains the Accounts Receivable (EAR) ID of that guarantor account.

columns.name: SOURCE_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a provider network, this column contains the Network Database (NET) ID of that provider network.

columns.name: SOURCE_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: SUBJ_MEMBER_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a person who receives care at your facility or is a member of your health plan, this column contains the Patient (EPT) ID of that member.

columns.name: SUBJ_STAFF_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is an employee of your facility, this column contains the Provider (SER) ID of that employee.

columns.name: SUBJ_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a plan group, this column contains the Payor Plan Group (PPG) ID of that plan group.

columns.name: SUBJ_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: SUBJ_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a carrier, this column contains the Carrier (MCR) ID of that carrier.

columns.name: SUBJ_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: SUBJ_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a provider network, this column contains the Network Database (NET) ID of that provider network.

columns.name: SUBJ_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: SUBJ_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a vendor, this column contains the Vendor (VEN) ID of that vendor.

columns.name: SUBJ_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: SUBJ_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a referral, this column contains the Referral Database (RFL) ID of that referral.

columns.name: SUBJ_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a claim, this column contains the Claims System (CLM) ID of that claim.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the patient encounter related to the customer service communication.

columns.name: RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel for the customer service communication.

columns.name: RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: LOB_ID
columns.description: The line of business for the customer service communication.

columns.name: LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: REC_SENSITIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for the sensitivity type of the customer service communication.

columns.name: REC_COMM_ORIGIN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the application which initiated the customer service communication.

columns.name: SRC_CUSTOMER
columns.description: If the source type of the customer service communication is a custom value, this column contains the free text source. For example, the name of the person who called your facility's customer service representative.

columns.name: SRC_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a vendor, this column contains the Vendor (VEN) ID of that vendor.

columns.name: SRC_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: SRC_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a payor, this column contains the Payor Master (EPM) ID of that payor.

columns.name: SRC_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: RECORD_ENTRY_TIME
columns.description: The time the customer service communication was entered.

columns.name: SUB_CUSTOMER
columns.description: If the subject type of the customer service communication is a custom value, this column contains the free text subject. For example, the name of the person the customer service communication is about.

columns.name: SUB_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a location, this column contains the Facility Profile (EAF) ID of that location.

columns.name: SUB_POS_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a place of service, this column contains the Facility Profile (EAF) ID of that place of service.

columns.name: SUB_DEPT_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a department, this column contains the Department (DEP) ID of that department.

columns.name: REC_RES_TIME
columns.description: The time the customer service communication was resolved.

columns.name: LAB_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: Laboratory specimen associated with this laboratory communication log.

columns.name: SUBJ_REQ_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper associated with the laboratory communication log.

columns.name: LAB_LOG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The Lab Comm Log Status category value for the laboratory communication log.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID_NUM
columns.description: The external ID for the customer service communication.

columns.name: SUBJECT_EAR_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a guarantor account, this column contains the Accounts Receivable (EAR) ID of that guarantor account.

columns.name: VALID_CRM_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the customer service communication is valid. 'Y' or NULL indicates the communication is valid. 'N' indicates the communication is invalid.

columns.name: RES_1ST_ATTEMPT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the customer service communication was resolved on the first attempt. 'Y' indicates it was resolved on first attempt. 'N' indicates it was resolved after first attempt or is still unresolved. A null value indicates the customer service communication was created but never opened or required values were not entered.

columns.name: OWN_BUS_SEG_EAF_ID
columns.description: Owning business segment, for use in business segmentation. Only populated if the customer service communication is created in a payor business segment. Not populated when the record is created in a service area.

columns.name: CREATION_SA_PBS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area or payer business segment where the customer service communication was created.

columns.name: SUB_TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the subtopic of the customer service communication record. Used in combination with TOPIC_C to further categorize the topic of the customer service communication.

columns.name: HAR_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a hospital account, this column contains the Hospital Account (HAR) ID.

columns.name: ROUT_HX_HTH_ID
columns.description: The routing history thread for the customer service communication.

columns.name: SOURCE_PBA_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a premium billing account, this column contains the PB Account (PBA) ID.

columns.name: SUBJECT_PBA_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a premium billing account, this column contains the PB Account (PBA) ID.

columns.name: LAB_REQ_ID
columns.description: Laboratory requisition associated with this laboratory communication log.

columns.name: LAB_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the laboratory case associated with the laboratory communication log.

columns.name: BANK_RECON_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a bank reconciliation, this column contains the Cash (CSH) ID of that bank reconciliation.

columns.name: SOURCE_PROSPECT_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a prospective patient, this column contains the Requisition Grouper (RQG) ID of that prospective patient.

columns.name: SUBJECT_PROSPECT_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a prospective patient, this column contains the Requisition Grouper (RQG) ID of that prospective patient.

columns.name: SOURCE_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a submitter, this column contains the Submitter (SMT) ID of that submitter.

columns.name: SOURCE_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: SUBJECT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is an order, this column contains the Order (ORD) ID.

columns.name: SUBJECT_CAMPAIGN_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a campaign, this column contains the Campaign (CCT) ID of that campaign.

columns.name: SUBJECT_CAMPAIGN_ID_CAMPAIGN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the campaign record.

columns.name: SUBJECT_DECISION_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a decision, this column contains the Financial Assistance Tracker (FNT) ID of that decision.

columns.name: SUBJECT_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is an estimate, this column contains the Estimate (PES) ID of that estimate.

columns.name: ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the customer service communication was entered, in UTC format.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the customer service communication was resolved, in UTC format.

columns.name: SOURCE_RESP_PRTY_GUID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is a responsible party for a patient, this column contains the GUID of that responsible party.

columns.name: SUBJECT_RESP_PRTY_GUID
columns.description: If the subject of the customer service communication is a responsible party for a patient, this column contains the GUID of that responsible party.

columns.name: SOURCE_USER_ID
columns.description: If the source of the customer service communication is an employee, this column contains the ID of that user record.

columns.name: VOID_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who voided this NCS

columns.name: VOID_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant at which this NCS was voided.

columns.name: APPEAL_DECISION_DATE
columns.description: The date the appeal's outcome was decided.

columns.name: APPEAL_SENT_TO_IRE_DATE
columns.description: The date the appeal case was sent to the Independent Review Entity.

columns.name: SUBJECT_AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: Auth Request (AUG) that this CRM is about.
